p:
Alternatively, RSV preF and postF mouse IgG antibodies were detected by ELISA using streptavidin-coated plates incubated with biotin-labeled preF
23 or postF protein, followed by serially diluted serum. Mouse RSV F-specific antibodies were detected by HRP-labeled anti-mouse IgG and the wells were developed with LumiGlo. The luminescence signal was measured and relative potency against a standard sample was calculated.
